name: Anticlimactic
description:
Ant simulation

r to restart

wasd to move camera

1,2, and 3 to control speed

egg pens are where ants store the eggs the queen produces

the ants will take the eggs out to attempt to hatch them

there is a 40% chance of them hatching

food pens are where ants store the food that they gather

ants need to eat so they will often go down and eat when they get hungry

ants can starve

the queen requires food to make eggs so the ants will deliver her food

the queen lays eggs only when she has food in her stomach

the eggs need to be transported to storage so the ants will do that

the ants will go out of the mound to find food when short

ants slow when they are tired or hungry

if they get too tired or hungry, they die
